column4: can anyone help me I am trying to burn some files to disc using Brasero in Ubuntu 10.4 LTS and it instantly fails when i click burn and says  Some files have invalid names" I then have an option to save the log. I save the log and read it it mentiones invalid names but does not exactly say what are the invalid names it does nolt make sense to me :s here is my Brasero burn log that failed http://pastebin.com/06hJfmTV
any help would be apreciated guys
